title: Chloe Ferry displays her curves as she munches on a McDonald's on night out in London
text:
She recently parted ways with ex boyfriend Sam Gowland.

And Chloe Ferry displayed her sensational physique as she stepped out for a late night bite to eat in London on Monday.

The Geordie Shore star, 24, donned a cream cropped jumper with rolled up sleeves and a turtle neck that displayed her taut abdomen as she munched on a McDonald's.

Snack: Chloe Ferry, 24, displayed her sensational physique as she stepped out for a late night bite to eat in London on Monday

Chloe further displayed her curves with a pair of skintight blue jeans and added height to her frame with a pair of black heels.

Sporting a smokey eye, the reality star let her platinum blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders for the evening.

Chloe's outing comes shortly after her acrimonious split from fellow Geordie Shore star Sam.

Sam proved he's moved on his ex for good as he had her face tattoo on his leg covered up.

Style: The Geordie Shore star donned a cream cropped jumper with rolled up sleeves and a turtle neck that displayed her taut abdomen as she munched on a McDonald's

Taking to Instagram last week, the reality star, 24, showed off his new inking of a very large bear on his thigh in a video, captioning it: 'Cover up on thigh, leg sleeve pending.'

Their relationship came crashing to an end when she dumped him after accusing him cheating with Love Island beauty Amber Davies.

The large tattoo covered the previous one of Chloe's face, which he obtained when the duo appeared on MTV show Just Tattoo Of Us in November last year.

At the time, the star was furious with his ex, exclaiming: 'Why the f**k did you do that for?'

While Chloe, who initially picked the design so she could c**k block her partner, admitted some regret about her choice adding: 'I am regretting it a little bit now. I didn't think it would be that big!'

However, the tattoo is no longer a problem for Sam as he now sports a huge inking of a roaring bear on his leg.
description: The Geordie Shore star, 24, sensational physique as she stepped out for a late night bite to eat in London on Monday.
